title: Where do I find the link to my digital Collection?
excerpt: Once you have submitted your digital Collection for publication and it has been
content:
Once you have submitted your digital Collection for publication and it has been approved, a link to it will be created. To share the link with your students:

  1. From the first screen, select the Collection's Get Link.
  2. Copy the link to your computer's clipboard.
  3. Paste the link into an email to your students.
